paper_abstract: We show that language inclusion for languages of infinite words defined by nondeterministic automata can be tested in polynomial time if the automata are unambiguous and have simple acceptance conditions, namely safety or reachability conditions. An automaton with safety condition accepts an infinite word if there is a run that never visits a forbidden state, and an automaton with reachability condition accepts an infinite word if there is a run that visits an accepting state at least once. (C) 2012 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Efficient inclusion testing for simple classes of unambiguous omega-automata
